Uses of Interface
org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.rule.Condition

Packages that use Condition
Package
Description
org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.rule
Use Signal annotations to declare conditions and Effect to link these conditions to an effect.
org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.setting.columnselection
This package offers the ColumnSelection class used for settings holding a single selected column.
org.knime.core.webui.node.view.table

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ArrayContainsCondition
    Apply this condition in a signal at an array layout field (NOT to a field in the Element POJO).
    final class 
    FalseCondition
    Triggers when a boolean is false.
    final class 
    HasMultipleItemsCondition
    Triggers if the respective field has at least 2 elements.
    class 
    IsNoneColumnStringCondition
    Condition that triggers when "None" column is selected.
    class 
    IsSpecificStringCondition
    Condition to be used when an field serialized to a string should trigger a Signal when it matches a specific string.
    class 
    OneOfEnumCondition<E extends Enum<E>>
    Triggers if an enum has one of a specified subset of values.
    class 
    PatternCondition
    Use this annotation for text inputs in order to trigger an effect when the supplied pattern is met.
    final class 
    TrueCondition
    Triggers when a boolean is true.
